programme.title: Space Dealers
programme.desc: Cole gets lucky when he finds a Russian space suit in an old box. But there’s a problem – the gloves are missing. To find the gloves he has to strike a deal with Larry which sees them take a trip through the desert. Meanwhile Torie hears how Coke and Pepsi joined the space race; and she meets former NASA astronaut Winston Scott who tells her about the struggles of keeping clean in zero-G. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: UFO Conclusion

programme.title: Space Channel Music

programme.title: Space Dealers
programme.desc: It’s one of the biggest events in the space calendar – a gala dinner at Kennedy Space Center with Buzz Aldrin and Apollo 13’s Jim Lovell. But Larry, Cole and Torie don’t have tickets. So when one comes up for grabs they do what they do best – they face off in a space dealing competition: whoever makes the most money before the big night wins. Torie stakes her reputation on an Apollo 17 map used on the surface of the moon; Larry gets his hands on a one-of-a-kind Skylab prototype; and Cole acquires a mysterious homing beacon – could it be a relic from an Apollo mission? To make big money and win the ticket Cole has to turn detective. Duration: 3600

programme.desc: In five days the world changed. As a retired Intelligence agent turned UFO investigator races to discover the fate of the human race, an alien observer searches for the human woman he loves. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Shorts
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers Episode 1 Apollo 15
programme.desc: Larry takes on an impossible mission: he’s been asked find an item worn in space by Apollo 15 legend Al Worden. It’s going to be tough but Larry is keen to succeed – if he pulls it off he gets to meet the great man himself. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: There is no one coming, no one to help. She's alone. Duration: 1246

programme.title: Latest News - China Starlink update
programme.desc: As commercial and government space programs continue to overlap, China seems particularly worried about SpaceX. According to China Military Online, an official website linked to China’s Central Military Commission, Elon Musk’s SpaceX might be used by the “hegemony-obsessed US” to dominate space and bring “chaos or calamity” to the world. Duration: 190

programme.title: Edge of Infinity - ISLANDS
programme.desc:
In a sense, each of us is an island. In another sense, however, we are all one. For though islands appear separate, and may even be situated at great distances from one another, they are only extrusions of the same planet, Earth.
- J. Donald Walters Duration: 234

programme.title: David Becker - Truth Lies Within
programme.desc: Jazz Guitarist David Becker captures the ultimate Universal duality that's hard to ignore. In Partnership with Space Channel Music, David's melodious guitar takes us on a journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 500
